Claim #1: "Legacy storage vendors offer comparable solutions for block and file."

Pure's Advantage: FlashArray allows customers to avoid disruption due to storage with support for non-disruptive, data in place upgrades without exception. Pure Storage is the only vendor with a proven track record. Customers will experience upgrades painlessly rather than have to deal with pressure to upgrade to new generations of hardware, forklift upgrades, and planned downtime.
